review: The fire stick is everything they said it would be and it meets all my expectations

review: Started the set up which worked great, then it would not work after watching one show.  We tried at two of our homes and sane issue.  Currently not pleased but we are going to return and try a replacement.

review: More than I expected. Nice to have youtube on tv and many more upcoming apps.

review: The stick works as advertised the only thing that would be nice is to have an option to eliminate the cost items which makes searching for free content easier.

review: It's amazing. I haven't had any problems with it. Setup was as simple as it gets. Thanks for the low price. I recommend this to any person wanting a good HDMI TV stick.
